verdict.summary: Tower's Service trait has strict type requirements for Request and Response types. Ensure your service implementation matches the expected types.

dead_ends.action: Implement Service manually for complex middleware stacks
dead_ends.why_fails: Manual Service impls are error-prone and hard to maintain; tower layers handle this better

workarounds.action: Use tower::ServiceBuilder to compose layers properly
Ensure Request and Response body types match between layers

leads_to.condition: When service configuration issues lead to runtime connection problems

preceded_by.condition: When generic trait bound errors involve tower Service

frequently_confused_with.distinction: General trait error vs tower-specific Service trait implementation requirements
